entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
